Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERS_INS_SP" ( NEW_GROUP_ID NUMBER, NEW_PARENT_GROUP_ID NUMBER ) AS BEGIN IF NEW_GROUP_ID = NEW_PARENT_GROUP_ID THEN INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS ( ID, GROUP_ID, PARENT_GROUP_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS_S1.NEXTVAL, NEW_GROUP_ID, NEW_GROUP_ID, SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE, 1 ); ELSE INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS (ID, GROUP_ID, PARENT_GROUP_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS_S1.NEXTVAL, FH2.GROUP_ID, FH.PARENT_GROUP_ID, SYSDATE, 1, SYSDATE, 1 FROM CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS FH, CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS FH2 WHERE FH.GROUP_ID = NEW_PARENT_GROUP_ID AND FH2.PARENT_GROUP_ID = NEW_GROUP_ID; END IF; END CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERS_INS_SP;
